name: Monster Cakes (Demo)
description:
**This is an early Demo so there buggy shenanigans afoot** Controls: (Keyboard)                                                                             (Controller *using 360 as a model*)

move = arrow keys                                                   move = D Pad

A = attack                                                                      X = attack

Hold A (Charge Attack)                                       Hold X (Charge Attack)

S = Special  (Not Implemented yet)           Y = sub weapon Special (Not Implemented)

E = interact                                                                 B = Interact

Space = Jump (Double Jump is possible) A = Jump (Double Jump is possible)

W = Dash (ground only)                                          RB = Dash (ground only)                      

                                      Run = tap left or right twice (ground only)

                                     Air Dash = tap left or right twice (Air only)

                                                    (Not Implemented yet) 

Wall Slide = Pres direction towards wall in air.

Pause = esc key                                                      Pause = start button

In the wake of rebuilding Zieraphi I put this together using some new and old stuff I've been working on. 

Known issues for v001a:

* NO WAY TO EXIT GAME (small oversight but you can just X out of it to close the window).

There's a small but where sub menu  button gets unseleted should you click on it with a mouse  (while using a controller)

More to come soon Thanks everyone.

PS. if thre's a problem with the Mac build please let me know for this is my first mac build ... Ever, thank you.

UP Next: 

  • More NPC's 
  • Sub Abilities
  • Main Deliveries
  • Side Quests
  • NPC interactions
  • Item screen Functionality
  • more enemy types
  • starting tutorial
